extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Camp Manitou in CANADA, Since 1959 Manitou has offered children from the world over the opportunity to have fun, learn skills and enjoy this pristine Canadian setting.  Check out over 30 amazing activities and learn more about what makes the Manitou-CANADA family so special. Check out our App to keep up-to-date with all things Manitou:-watch camp videos in your own Mannyâs theatre-see our promo video for new families-take a peek at our latest photos from the summer-keep up-to-date with new bulletins-packing checklist for all the essentials for the summer-request a brochure-check out Manitouâs birthdays and load your own-take a âwalkâ through our map to check out all activity areas-Manitou Cares section for all events and pictures to enjoy from past events-links to friends of Manitou Cares-important articles for parents-âcamp isâ speeches from past summers-directions to camp from your locationCAMP MANITOU www.manitoucamp.com  MANITOU CARES www.manitoucares.com

reviews.comment: This app is awesome! I cant wait to go back to camp manitou! w00t!
